pages.title: Thermal Conduit
pages.text: The <item>Thermal Conduit/$ is a way of heating or cooling <thing>$(l:crossroads:intro/alchemy)reagents/$ flowing through <item>$(l:crossroads:alchemy/conduit)conduits/$. Another way to do this is by using a <item>$(l:crossroads:alchemy/vessel)reaction vessel/$.$(br2)They input <thing>$(l:crossroads:intro/alchemy)reagents/$ on one side, and output on the opposite side. They cannot face vertically, and have both a glass

and crystal variant. A <item>$(l:crossroads:heat/cable)heat cable/$ can connect to the top/bottom.$(br2)Any <thing>$(l:crossroads:intro/alchemy)reagents/$ flowing through the tube will have the temperature set to that of the attached <item>$(l:crossroads:heat/cable)heat cable/$. This will change the temperature of the <item>$(l:crossroads:heat/cable)heat cable/$ towards the temperature of the <thing>$(l:crossroads:intro/alchemy)reagents/$, so it may be necessary to have multiple <item>thermal conduits/$ in series if there
